column1: Number of Lab-Confirmed COVID-19-Associated Fatalities by Age Group and Month
Source: Rhode Island Department of Health (RIDOH) COVID-19 Fatality Database

NOTES: Congregate setting residents are included. Out-of-state residents are excluded. Fatality counts include deaths among people with lab-confirmed COVID-19. Deaths are reported to RIDOH by the State Medical Examiner, Vital Records, Long-Term Care and Assisted Living Facilities, and all Rhode Island hospitals. 
Small numbers are shown as <5 in line with RIDOH's Small Numbers Policy. We provide monthly data to help show more reliable trends over time by subgroup. Please use caution when interpreting these data as other factors, including underlying medical conditions, can increase risk for severe illness and death.
